title: 🎨 Magic Scribble – Support
content:
Thank you for using Magic Scribble!

This app was created by a parent to inspire creativity and confidence in young children through drawing, coloring, and simple puzzles.

🛠️ Need Help?

If you're experiencing any issues with the app, please reach out — I'd be happy to help!

📧 Email: dentin-97.aniline@icloud.com

❓ Common Questions

Q: Does this app collect any data?
A: No. Magic Scribble does not collect or store any personal data. There are no accounts, no ads, and no tracking.

Q: Does it work offline?
A: Yes! Everything is fully local — perfect for car rides, flights, or quiet time.

Q: What age is it for?
A: The app is designed for kids aged 3–7, with a simple, kid-safe interface.

🔄 App Version

Latest version: 1.0
Last updated: June 2025
